title: Embroidered Pastel Kurta Set
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's kurta set consisting of a straight-cut pastel mint green kurta with subtle floral embroidery along the neckline and hem, paired with matching tapered pants, isolated on a plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: Kurta: cotton-silk blend, 3/4 sleeves, round neckline with keyhole slit, floral embroidery at neckline and hem, side slits, mid-thigh length. Pants: tapered fit, elasticated waistband, ankle length. Color: pastel mint green with blush pink embroidery. Stitching: lockstitch seams, overlock edges.
provenance: Designed from trending 'kurta-set' category for commercial ready-to-wear collection.
design_text:
Embroidered Pastel Kurta Set (KS-2024-001)
Colors: pastel mint green, soft ivory, blush pink accents
Fabrics: cotton-silk blend, lightweight cotton lining
Prints/Patterns: delicate floral embroidery
Garment Type: kurta-set
Silhouette: straight-cut kurta with tapered pants
Sleeves: three-quarter sleeves
Neckline: round neckline with keyhole slit
Length: mid-thigh kurta length
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: embroidered neckline and hem, side slits, fabric-covered buttons at keyhole
Techpack: available
